Jaccard index table that compares the baseline method with the four types of new methods.
b=0 stands for separating borders, b=1 stands for joining borders.
c=0 stands for using pixel vertices, c=1 stands for using pixel edges.

  ID  baseline  b=0 & c=0  b=1 & c=0  b=0 & c=1  b=1 & c=1

 297  0.453357   0.509724   0.507406   0.509724   0.507265
 713  0.549347   0.512417   0.509248   0.512417   0.509125

 209  0.411569   0.561911   0.557322   0.561911   0.557194
